description: Processes and analyzes PowerPoint files, allowing for reading, retrieving content, analyzing data, and updating slides.
name: PPTX File Processor

file_path.description: The path or URL to the PPTX file. If no file path is provided, it will use the in-memory file.

operation.description: The operation to perform on the PPTX file: READ | RETRIEVE | ANALYZE | UPDATE

prompt.description: Prompt to apply for ANALYZE or UPDATE operations.

analysis.description: Analysis result of the PPTX content

content.description: Extracted content from the PPTX slides
